channel.title: AttackTypes
channel.description: I am useing Richscape 4.3, I'm trying to figure out how to change the attack type. Like a bow has accurate, rapid, longrange. Etc etc. I added a new bow and it has Slash stab and all that.

item.description:
@klorox wrote:

Found it, thanks everyone.

item.title: AttackTypes
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

I have a list of such sidebar interfaces if you don’t have them already.

1698 = choose attack style interface
425 = same as 1698, but different style of weapon
1764 = see 425
7762 = see 425
1749 = see 425
2423 = see 425
4705 = see 425
5570 = see 425
8460 = see 425
776 = see 425
4679 = see 425
3796 = see 425
2276 = see 425
328 = see 425
4446 = see 425
5855 = see 425
12290 = see 425

I don’t remember which is which though, sorry.
I was in a rush when I was making the list, so I wasn’t very specific with a few things.

Read full topic

item.title: AttackTypes
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:2, topic:257527”]I think.if(id == ##){ if(FightType == 1) { return ##; } if(FightType == 2) { return ##; } }[/quote]
No, you’d need to make it set the certain interface, it probably has the interface for a sword right now.

Read full topic
